issue.title: Block graph.facebook.com connection that a bank do.
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

last version

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

||graph.facebook.com^$app=cl.android

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Spanish/Portuguese filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Hello. The app "Banco Falabella", a popular bank that is in Colombia, Chile, etc, connects to "graph.facebook.com", even that the app doesn't have any functionality and connection to Facebook. 

2. Screenshots

![Screenshot_2023-01-20-21-22-10-732-edit_com adguard android](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/79816807/213828554-91b67dc4-3e5d-4bf3-9184-52120f70682d.jpg)

||graph.facebook.com^$app=cl.android

Thanks!

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
I don't have a clue why it is inconsistent. I shut down my computer over night. After booting up in the morning AdGuard worked just fine. I can't explain it, and am thankful it's working now.

------- Original Message -------

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://trello.com/b/UxSwOSpw/rezepte](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Ftrello.com%2Fb%2FUxSwOSpw%2Frezepte) ### Comment Username: @Scolaro > Screenshot 1 (AdGuard on): I press "Attachment", choose the image I want to upload to the card and get the error message in the lower left corner. > Screenshot 2 (AdGuard off): I press "Attachment", choose the image I want to upload to the card and get the success message. The image appears in the card. > > Every once in a while an image goes through when AdGuard is on (because I forget to turn it off), but it's mostly the first one, then nothing else goes through until I turn AdGuard off. > Oftentimes I also get an error (from Trello on their website) that I am not connected to the server. Everything (creating cards, changing text etc) continues to work except for the image upload, and once AdGuard is off there are no more server error messages on the Trello site either. > Note that all my Trello pages are affected by this issue, not just the "Rezepte" one from the screenshots. ### Screenshots
